text: Damian Player Clawdbot looks intimidating. it's not. here's the full setup in 30 minutes. 3.4M everyone's talking about clawdbot. twitter's going crazy. people posting screenshots of their bots clearing inboxes, scheduling meetings, researching companies while they sleep. and you're sitting there wondering if you missed the window. you didn't. here's how to set it up before the hype dies down and you forget.
